title: Ep. 205 Marin Katusa – Why I'm Not Buying Gold Stocks
itunes:title: Marin Katusa – Why I'm Not Buying Gold Stocks
description:
On this week's show, Frank interviews Marin Katusa, mining expert and newsletter editor for Casey Research.
 Marin highlights his favorite sector – and shares his two best junior mining ideas that could double over the next 12 months. 
 Plus, you won't want to miss why he says gold companies have more downside ahead... 
 You'll hear Frank talk about the markets and why they could fall sharply to end the year.
 And... we finish our show with an educational segment where Frank breaks down the one stock that every listener should own.
